attributes.action: Boris Johnson did not influence my leave the EU vote with the Leave bus logo!
attributes.additional_details: There is no evidence that 17,410,742 leave voters were influenced by a bus logo. This petition can prove Boris Johnson’s innocence as there were many reasons why the public voted leave other than a bus logo which is insulting to imply!
attributes.background: Leave voters must no longer be accused of being lied to by claims that a bus logo influenced their choice of vote! This petition can clear up the confusion fuelled by remainers once and for all and proving Boris Johnsons innocence in the process!!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
